keyPolicies.policyTitle: NO FEES EVER – KEEP TUITION FREE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Education benefits us all, not just students, and must be based on the ability to learn, not to pay.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: FAIRER TAXES – INVEST IN PUBLIC SERVICES
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only Greens are offering an alternative to the cuts to public services: investment built on revenue from big business and the better off.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: CUT YOUR BILLS – INSULATE EVERY HOME
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We would insulate every home for free, boost jobs and tackle climate change.

issues.education: NO FEES EVER – KEEP TUITION FREE: Education benefits us all, not just students, and must be based on the ability to learn, not to pay.
issues.environment: CUT YOUR BILLS – INSULATE EVERY HOME: We would insulate every home for free, boost jobs and tackle climate change.
